page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: BECAUSE MANY OF THE FARMS IN THIS AREA ARE SMALL THEY HAVE TO DIVERSIFY AND SEEK OTHER SOURCES OF INCOME.THESE INCLUDE KEEPING FREE_RANGE DUCKS AND HENS AND SELLING THE EGGS,BREEDING GAME BIRDS AND ESTABLISHING SMALL CARAVAN SITES OR DOING BED AND BREAKFAST.THESE ARE THE TYPES OF FARM THAT THE MANAGER OF {NAFFERTON }PAGE 5 BELIEVES MAY SOON GO OUT OF BUSINESS. MANY FARMS NOW SELL PRODUCE TO THE PUBLIC.{NORTH ACOMB FARM }DOES THIS AND HAS A WELL STOCKED SHOP SELLING MEAT FOR THE THE FREEZER,CHICKENS,EGGS MILK,CREAM AND BUTTER.UNFORTUNATELY ONLY A CAR OWNER CAN EASILY REACH IT AS THE SHOP IS A LONG WAY FROM THE MAIN ROAD.IT IS ON A HILL AND AFFORDS A MAGNIFICENT VIEW OF THE SURROUNDING COUNTRYSIDE,SO THERE ARE COMPENSATIONS.
